oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allison, Richard H., 1838 June 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Richard H. Allison, dated January 31st, 1837. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allison’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on June 25th, 1838. The verso cites: “Recorded in book No. 11, page 172.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allison family
